**Now use Bulma.io components inside FramerX.**

_Built using [Bloomer](https://bloomer.js.org/#/)_

**Elements available:**

- Box
- Button
- Content
- Delete
- Form: Input, TextArea, Select, Checkbox, Radio
- Notification
- Progress
- Table
- Tag
- Title, Subtitle, Heading

More elements & components will be added in the future.
